alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crook County through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Sundance, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cement Ridge Lookout. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 185 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for west central South Dakota...and northeastern Wyoming.
